name: Cyber Monk 2077
description:
What I learned during this jam

Level design takes time. I spent almost all my time learning how to interact and grow/shrink my player character, and simply ran out of time. It's here for the sake of submitting it though!

controls

Mouse to look
WASD to move
Spacebar to jump
E to interact.
